item.title: The Myth of Japanese Rail [WIP]
item.description:
Japanese rail companies do not rely on magic spells

  • Japanese trains are never late ?

  • rely on the people ?

    Conditions of the study

    Infrastructure

  • Tunnels, passage a niveau etc

  • protection au niveau des quais

    Japan has more rail

    Simply, more railways run parallel

    Competition

    In tokyo, several companies

    Overall design of Tokyo and its impact on the network

    Design of lines

    Frequency

    Delays and incidents are still common

    Budget and fares
